[DQC.IFRS.0127.9597] The statement 00400 - Statement - Unaudited Consolidated statements of financial position includes the concept ifrs-full:OtherFinancialAssets in the presentation tree. The filing includes a dimensional table to represent this statement. The filing does not include a valid dimensional structure for the presentation item ifrs-full:OtherFinancialAssets. The concept has the following values associated with it in the filing :
48,929,000,000
None of these values however, are valid for the financial statement table. If the value appears in the financial statements, then either a dimension or line item needs to be added to the structure of the definition linkbase that defines the report. If the item is not represented on the financial statements, then the presentation item should be removed.
Total Element : ifrs-full:OtherFinancialAssets Total period : 2021-06-30 Dimensions : ifrs-full:ContinuingAndDiscontinuedOperationsAxis=ifrs-full:DiscontinuedOperationsMember

[DQC.IFRS.0127.9597] The statement 00400 - Statement - Unaudited Consolidated statements of financial position includes the concept ifrs-full:OtherFinancialAssets in the presentation tree. The filing uses an XBRL table called set(puk:IfrsStatementTable) to represent this statement. The table includes the dimensions set(Dimension: ifrs-full:ContinuingAndDiscontinuedOperationsAxis Cube: puk:IfrsStatementTable DRS Role: http://www.prudential.co.uk/role/StatementUnauditedConsolidatedStatementsOfFinancialPosition Members: ifrs-full:AggregateContinuingAndDiscontinuedOperationsMember ifrs-full:ContinuingOperationsMember (DOMAIN) (DEFAULT) ). This table includes a presentation concept called ifrs-full:OtherFinancialAssets. This concept however has the following values associated with it, none of following values can exist within the table set(puk:IfrsStatementTable):
list(None, None)
None of these values however, are valid for the financial statement table. If the value appears in the financial statements, then either a dimension or line item needs to be added to the structure of the definition linkbase that defines the report. If the item is not represented on the financial statements, then the presentation item should be removed.

[DQC.IFRS.0127.9597] The statement 00400 - Statement - Unaudited Consolidated statements of financial position includes the concept ifrs-full:OtherFinancialAssets in the presentation tree. The filing uses an XBRL table called puk:IfrsStatementTable to represent this statement. The table includes the dimensions ifrs-full:ContinuingAndDiscontinuedOperationsAxis. This table includes a presentation concept called ifrs-full:OtherFinancialAssets. This concept however has the following values associated with it, none of following values can exist within the table puk:IfrsStatementTable:
ifrs-full:OtherFinancialAssets = 48,929,000,000
None of these values however, are valid for the financial statement table. If the value appears in the financial statements, then either a dimension or line item needs to be added to the structure of the definition linkbase that defines the report. If the item is not represented on the financial statements, then the presentation item should be removed.
Total Element : ifrs-full:OtherFinancialAssets Total period : 2021-06-30 Dimensions : ifrs-full:ContinuingAndDiscontinuedOperationsAxis=ifrs-full:DiscontinuedOperationsMember
